data:
## function_Collapse
> **Collapse**(`props`): `Element`

Defined in: [react/bootstrap/src/components/collapse/collapse.tsx:20](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/react/bootstrap/src/components/collapse/collapse.tsx#L20)

Collapse component that provides a collapsible container.

This component uses the useWidgetWithConfig hook to create a collapse widget
and applies transition directives to the container.

### Parameters

#### props

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`CollapseProps`](#collapseprops)\> & `object` & `object`

The properties for the Collapse component.

### Returns

`Element`

A div element with transition directives applied, containing the child elements.

## interface_CollapseApi
Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/collapse/collapse.gen.ts:142

Interface representing the API for a collapsible component.

### Methods

#### close

> **close**(): `void`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/collapse/collapse.gen.ts:147

Triggers collapse closing programmatically.

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### open

> **open**(): `void`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/collapse/collapse.gen.ts:153

Triggers the collapse content to be displayed for the user.

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### toggle

> **toggle**(): `void`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/collapse/collapse.gen.ts:159

Toggles the collapse content visibility.

##### Returns

`void`

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/collapse/collapse.gen.ts:108

If `true`, collapse closing and opening will be animated.

##### Default Value

`true`

> **animatedOnInit**: `boolean`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/collapse/collapse.gen.ts:100

If `true`, collapse opening will be animated at init time.

##### Default Value

`false`

> **horizontal**: `boolean`

## interface_CollapseState
Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/collapse/collapse.gen.ts:27

Represents the state of a collapse component.
Extends the properties and state from `CollapseCommonPropsAndState`.

### Properties

#### className

> **className**: `string`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/collapse/collapse.gen.ts:39

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### hidden

> **hidden**: `boolean`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/collapse/collapse.gen.ts:32

Is `true` when the collapse is hidden. Compared to `visible`, this is updated after the transition is executed.

***

#### horizontal

> **horizontal**: `boolean`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/collapse/collapse.gen.ts:46

If `true`, collapse will be done horizontally.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/collapse/collapse.gen.ts:53

If `true` the collapse is visible to the user

##### Default Value

`true`

## type alias_CollapseWidget
> **CollapseWidget**: [`Widget`](../../../../api/react/bootstrap/components/collapse/../../types#widget)\<[`CollapseProps`](#collapseprops), [`CollapseState`](#collapsestate), [`CollapseApi`](#collapseapi), [`CollapseDirectives`](#collapsedirectives)\>

Defined in: react/bootstrap/src/components/collapse/collapse.gen.ts:183

Represents a widget for handling collapse functionality.

This type defines the structure of a CollapseWidget, which includes properties, state, API, and directives
necessary for managing the collapse behavior in the UI.
